question: The system used for rubbish/garbage collection in your local area is not working properly. This is causing problems for you and your neighbors. Write a letter to the council. In your letter describe how the rubbish collection system is not working properly. Explain how this affecting you and your neighbors. suggest what should be done about the problems.
text: Hello, I wish everything could be all right.

I am the homeowner of the main street in your responsibility area, and I am writing this letter because I found that our rubbish collection system was broken recently. The last day I saw that the button was off although it was full of garbage.

I must complain whit your collection system because we have to care about each other health. Also, pay our taxes every month, so we expect you that our environment should be clean and any equipment is correct. If you do not repair this system, our neighbours and we will be sick of the rubbish's smell and they are grubby.
May I suggest that  the best way to solve this problem is service charge every month, and repair or replace one of them which was broken or old?
Thank you for your attention to this matter.
